snippet: Tony Stewart made a late outside pass against Juan Pablo Montoya and held on at Dover International Speedway in Delaware on Sunday to snap a 30-race winless streak.
abstract: Tony Stewart holds on to win Nascar race at Dover International Speedway in Delaware, snapping a 30-race winless streak; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart made a late outside pass against Juan Pablo Montoya and held on at Dover International Speedway in Delaware on Sunday to snap a 30-race winless streak.
